title: How to install Discord on your Steam Deck (the EASY WAY)

media:group.media:title: How to install Discord on your Steam Deck (the EASY WAY)
media:group.media:description:
Installing Discord on Steam Deck couldn't be easier. Just follow this simple guide and you'll get it done in no time!
